channel.title: The new awards
channel.description:
Me, I do not deserve any awards this is being spoken for other people have put hard work into writing tutorials, and help people.
What happened to these awards, they aren't being handed out. And yes people do deserve them. I know its only a picture on your computer, but still, everything on the computer is just a picture.
Discuss..?

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Two new awards

I talk about one of them.

1/2 = 50%

My post was 50% relevant.

If you look further up, and on the previous page there are much less relevant posts.

Read full topic

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:30, topic:350097”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=446464.msg3279676#msg3279676 date=1279781201]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=446464.msg3279670#msg3279670 date=1279780925]

Thread cleaned once again. If you guys continue I’ll be giving out infractions.
[/quote]How was mine spam or breaking any rules? I was stating a fact, it was my opinion that the Java coder award should be given out more freely.

Davidi2:

Anyone that can program Java unrelated to RSPS is better than 75% of the community.

That was yours. It doesn’t have any relevance to the MoparScape awards other than the “Java Coder” one.

PS: complain about it in the staff complaints thread.
[/quote]It was related to the ‘Java Coder’ award. The thread is titled ‘new awards’. How is it not relevant?

I’m not complaining about a staff member, I’m wondering why it was deleted.[/quote]

Well in my eyes it just didn’t seem too relevent.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:

is there a server helper award?

i am pretty good with servers and have been helping people for a while
[/quote]Yes, but only one person has received and kept the award so far.

Why has there been only one person to receive it?

Also read my pm[/quote]

They just haven’t been given out frequently enough, but that should change soon.

EDIT: Thread cleaned.

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:26, topic:350098"][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=446464.msg3277537#msg3277537 date=1279648177]

[quote author=Adam link=topic=446464.msg3277515#msg3277515 date=1279645804]

to be honest it’s more of a disgrace to get an award on this site, pretty belittling if you ask me

The only reason you think that way is because you got ripped apart on MITB when you got the C#? award.

All in all though, there shouldn’t be awards for this site besides maybe the helper award.
[/quote]i didn’t get “ripped apart”, it was just yakman qqing and since i really didnt give a fuck about the award i requested for it to be removed, even though i was worthy of it[/quote]

Shut the fuck up. There are very few people that deserve to have self-proclaimed elitism such as yourself, you are not one of those people.[/quote]<3

All in all though, any further flame will result in an infraction. Continue on with the original topic, don’t talk about who deserves it and who doesn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: The new awards

item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

SilentCJ:

You’ll be surprised how much of an amateur he is, do you ever go to the graphics section?

Yes… I go and check out every newer model. He is definently better than most people that come to the model section here.

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:19, topic:350097”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=446464.msg3277598#msg3277598 date=1279654244]
Don’t need a model maker award, if the member was really good at it then they would aspire for the graphics master award, model maker would be too easy.
[/quote]

No one ever gets the graphics master, if it was given dylan should get.[/quote]

You’ll be surprised how much of an amateur he is, do you ever go to the graphics section?

[quote=“abraham2119, post:24, topic:350098”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=446464.msg3277598#msg3277598 date=1279654244]
Don’t need a model maker award, if the member was really good at it then they would aspire for the graphics master award, model maker would be too easy.
[/quote]isnt it the same with the java award…[/quote]

Well, java has to be kinda learned, model making, you can either do it or you can’t. Some of the guys read my tutorial and they’re straight off modelling complex models, some take a while to get into it.

Read full topic

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

How can you be motivated if only one person has received the server help award since March?

I’m sorry if I get mad at you. The reasoning behind awards was just told to me last night. I’m not a moderator so I can only assume that the you knew the reasoning before me because you can view the mod forums.

Read full topic

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:19, topic:350098”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=446464.msg3277134#msg3277134 date=1279604730]

to be honest it’s more of a disgrace to get an award on this site, pretty belittling if you ask me

you are not welcome here.
[/quote]fuck off you imbecilic prepubescent faggot, aiming for superiority when you are a deluded worthless dickhead will only affect your delusions of grandeur even more[/quote]If you’re on such a higher level than him, why is it worth your time to post this?

[quote=“casey., post:8, topic:350097”][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=446464.msg3277054#msg3277054 date=1279598560]
The “Java Coder” award is made for moparscapers though.
[/quote]
I guessed I would receive a moronic response along the lines of yours.

Because you know, I just joined yesterday, and don’t know how the awards work.

Maybe if you would use COMMON SENSE you would realize I was saying that NO ONE on MOPARSCAPE is CAPABLE OF EARNING THIS AWARD.[/quote]I would have expected a response such as this from you. You obviously don’t have an idea as to how the awards work. As it has been said before, the motivation on this site has been incredibly low in the past year or so. In order to raise this moral, these awards were developed. Although it’s a little conniving, the awards are a way to get the members of this forum to work harder. It was NOT made for their skill, but made in order to expand their skill that they’re lacking.

Perhaps everyone would be more content if we changed the title of that cup. Obviously no one deserves such a high standard titled award such as “JAVA Co0Dar”. In all of your attempts to make everyone feel undeserving and belittled, you haven’t made your self look any better. The title of the award is obviously low for standard’s sake, but you’re putting it out as if it’s as close as you can get to java guru.

Read full topic

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

CoonHunter:

Bleh, they are given out a bit rarely, ‘server coder’ and ‘model maker’ sound good, but idk about RSC Guru, seems like that one would go to peoples heads fast.

RSC Guru, for the people still in the RSC section.

Read full topic

As for RSC Guru, The RSC forums is basically those guys own little world, and only a few of the ones of have excelled in it could get it.

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura

@kihomura wrote:

Go cry in a ditch you whiny little cunt.

That was was completely uncalled for. I hope to not see more of this from you.

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:10, topic:350097”]The spam train ends here. Sorry, but it’s the last stop and the bridge ahead is broken.

So back on topic, only 4 people have awards on Moparscape…Those being Tico, Rich, Taharok, and JC.

I think the staff needs to go on a review and give some out, not to just their friends but to users who have shown that they really want to help the community. As I said earlier, the Java award is really limited, but is a server coder award out of the question? Is the help and tutorial cup out of the question? What about a RSC Guru or Model Maker? We have these awards for a reason, why not use them?[/quote]
Bleh, they are given out a bit rarely, ‘server coder’ and ‘model maker’ sound good, but idk about RSC Guru, seems like that one would go to peoples heads fast.

Read full topic

item.title: The new awards
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

The spam train ends here. Sorry, but it’s the last stop and the bridge ahead is broken.

So back on topic, only 4 people have awards on Moparscape…Those being Tico, Rich, Taharok, and JC.

I think the staff needs to go on a review and give some out, not to just their friends but to users who have shown that they really want to help the community. As I said earlier, the Java award is really limited, but is a server coder award out of the question? Is the help and tutorial cup out of the question? What about a RSC Guru or Model Maker? We have these awards for a reason, why not use them?

Read full topic
